additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Fruit (39%) (Raisins, Sultanas, Lemon Peel, Reconstituted Plum Puree), Inverted Sugar Syrup, Wheat Flour, Water, Rice Bran Oil Spread (Rice Bran Oil, Water, Emulsifiers (471, 322), Salt, Acidity Regulator (270)), Humectant (422 from Palm**), Brandy (3.5%), Breadcrumb (Wheat Flour, Salt, Yeast), Milk Solids, Golden Syrup, Sugar, Caramelised Sugar Syrup, Egg White Powder, Raising Agent (Sodium Carbonates), Mixed Spices, Preservative (Sorbic Acid), Stabiliser (415), Salt, Acidity Regulator (330), Natural Brandy Flavouring. Contains 1.38mL of alcohol per 100g of pudding.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Contain Walnut, May Contain Macadamia Nuts, Contains MILK, Contains EGG, May Contain Almonds, Contains Gluten, Contains Wheat, May Contain Pecan

description: Our family favourite traditional Christmas pudding is made with rich fruit and a dash of brandy. The perfect pudding for sharing!
name: Christmas Pudding Small
